uk.ac.aber.dcs.cs124.clg11.frame

Class NewRelDialog

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.aber.dcs.cs124.clg11.frame.NewRelDialog

  • public class NewRelDialog
extends java.lang.Object
    Dialog to add a new relationship between two classes to the project. Called by CanvasPanel
    Author:
    Connor Goddard (clg11), Sam Jackson (???), Craig Hepinsthall (???)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      NewRelDialog(CanvasPanel cp, int x1, int y1, int x2, int y2)
      Initialises and displays Relationship dialog and created all links to allow a relationship to be created between two classes

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addRel(int x1, int y1, int x2, int y2)
      Calculates the two closest ClassDiag objects from the two user mouse click positions and loads their information into the dialog to allow a relationship between the two to be created.

    • Constructor Detail

      • NewRelDialog

        public NewRelDialog(CanvasPanel cp,
            int x1,
            int y1,
            int x2,
            int y2)
        Initialises and displays Relationship dialog and created all links to allow a relationship to be created between two classes
        Parameters:
        cp - - Link to CanvasPanel to allow new relationship to be drawn on screen
        x1 - - X coordinate of first mouse click position on CanvasPanel
        y1 - - Y coordinate of first mouse click position on CanvasPanel
        x2 - - X coordinate of second mouse click position on CanvasPanel
        y2 - - Y coordinate of second mouse click position on CanvasPanel

    • Method Detail

      • addRel

        public void addRel(int x1,
          int y1,
          int x2,
          int y2)
        Calculates the two closest ClassDiag objects from the two user mouse click positions and loads their information into the dialog to allow a relationship between the two to be created.
        Parameters:
        x1 - - X coordinate of first mouse click position on CanvasPanel
        y1 - - Y coordinate of first mouse click position on CanvasPanel
        x2 - - X coordinate of second mouse click position on CanvasPanel
        y2 - - Y coordinate of second mouse click position on CanvasPanel
